head.title: Page not found | Cricava Technologies

div.div: CRICAVA a lot more than coding

li.p: We are 2 web coders. We have 3 cats. One of us is a well known programmer, the other one has a knack for design. We love what we do and we are really good at it. We are the number 1 provider at vWorker, do we need to say more?

We have recently started experimenting in the photography field. We are still learning but we already have some images we shared with the world at sxc.hu. Feel free to check them out and let us know if you liked/used them!

We are members of Couchsurfing.org, which basically means our house is an open hostel.
We have hosted folks from France, USA, Germany, Canada… and the list keeps going!

We belong to an local NGO that puts a lot of effort in helping out stray dogs. We neuter and rescue, we give shelter to puppies until they find a home and we educate people about the responsibility of owning a pet. Check out our website!

Argentina is famous for the quality of the meat and Mariano is famous for being a superb “parrillero”.
Clauz masters the wok and she prepares a killer mousse au chocolate!

We live three blocks away from the beach and we love gardening. We have a lemon tree, a blue berry tree and a very picky and a moody cherry tree. We are trying hard in the flower department but the snails make it very hard…

We also have a forest only six blocks away from the office where we take regular walks.
It is famous because there is an area with an unusual amount of energy where the tree huggers meet…

Mariano participated on a 48 hour coding competition known as Node Knockout.
As part of it, he helped build a HTML5 game with Node.js known as BOSSMAN.

CRICAVA’s offices are full of geek-niceties. Among them, a statue of El Eternauta, a framed Time magazine cover of Seinfeld’s last episode, a few posters from the oatmeal, and several programming books

We still own Mariano’s first computer, a Sharp PC-7000, no hard drive, but with two 5 1/4 floppy drives.
Here’s a picture of it as it stands in CRICAVA’s offices.

div.div: If you want to inquiry about our services, send us an email and we will respond promptly!

div.span: RT @smashingmag: New on Smashing Coding: All About Unicode, UTF8 & Character Sets - http://t.co/ficz6KlF
The Solar Impulse its on its way to Africa. We are witnessing history! http://t.co/As1aBTvU #solarimpulse
RT @mgiglesias: Si quieren entender un poco mas de que trata @workana lean este articulo: http://t.co/MQqCPsM9

span.p: Excellent approach. Professional. They worked closely with me to deliver what I want.
Excellent attitude. Very good communication throughout. High quality end product.

They will go the extra mile to get a client happy! Timely status reports, quick replies, very knowledgeable in their work, friendly, enthusiastic and real problem-solvers. every single adjustment was done in no-time and according to my wishes. Need to say more?
Very easy to work with! Carefully listened to all I wanted. Had good ideas to help the project beyond my initial conception

div.p:
# Average Rating: 10.00
# Ranked: 1 [ out of: 337,943 providers ]
# Projects: 400+

div.h3: This is a one page website, how could this happen...?
div.p: Either the world is coming to an end, you came across with a really REALLY old link or you have been tinkering with the urls in the browser...come on, get out of here!

div.div: Cricava 5.0 -aka Desaturated- brought to you by Clauz :: There is an easter egg somewhere on the page, did you find it? :: 2011 All rights reserved
